news.title: Without good data, Africa will find it hard to fight non-infectious diseases
news.summary: Slower activity. Abaporu , CC BY Non-communicable diseases that you can’t catch from someone else such as stroke, high blood pressure and cancer, account for 36.1m deaths worldwide . Put it another way, this is about 63% of all deaths in the world. While t
